data.scheme_name: Procurement and Marketing Support (PMS) Scheme  - Capacity Building  - Adoption of Bar Codes  - Existing
data.benefits: Scheme provides 80% of one-time registration fee  for obtaining up to 100 Nos. of bar codes (i.e. products) or actual whichever is less subject to Rs. 50,650.
data.eligibility: All existing micro enterprises having Udyam Registration Certificate are eligible under this scheme.
data.conditions:
1. Applicant must obtain up to 100 Nos. of bar codes (i.e. products). 
  2. Applicant must have Udyam Registration Certificate. 
  3. Applicant must have registration with GS1 India for use of Bar Codes.
data.beneficiaries: All existing micro enterprises having Udyam Registration Certificate are eligible under this scheme.
data.prerequisites:
1. Applicant must obtain up to 100 Nos. of bar codes (i.e. products). 
  2. Applicant must have Udyam Registration Certificate. 
  3. Applicant must have registration with GS1 India for use of Bar Codes.
data.context: This scheme is introduced to o create awareness and educate the MSMEs about importance / methods/process of packaging in marketing.
data.objective: The main aim is to promote new market access initiatives like organizing / participation in National / International Trade Fairs / Exhibitions / MSME Expo, etc. held across ttre country.
data.description: Scheme provides 80% of one-time registration fee and annual recurring fee (for first three years) paid by micro enterprises for obtaining up to 100 Nos. of bar codes (i.e. products) or actual whichever is less subject to Rs. 50,650.
data.how_to_apply: The applicant can apply through the link : https://my.msme.gov.in/MyMsme/Reg/COM_MatuBarAppForm.aspx
data.funding_mechanism: Applicant units shall have to submit their claim online in the prescribed format within 30 days of the event.
data.checklist_info_a:
1. Application Form
2. Declaration
3. Pre-receipt
4. Affidavit
5. Undertaking
6. Copy of UDYAM Regn- Certilicate 
7. CLAIM FORM
8. Copy of Aadhaar Card(s) (Director(s)/ Proprietor/ Partners)
9. Copy of GST Registration Certificate
10. Other related documents (PAN card)
data.checklist_info_d:
Address: R.K. Rai, Director, O/o DC MSME
Email: : rk.rai@nic.in
Ph.: 011 23062561
data.beneficiary: Manufacturing and Service Industry  - All Entities  - All Locations  - Micro
